import React, { useRef, useEffect, useState } from 'react'; const Header = () => { const headerRef = useRef(null); const menuRef = useRef(null); const [isMenuOpen, setMenuOpen] = useState(false); const [isSkillsOpen, setSkillsOpen] = useState(false); // Sticky Header Event Handler const handleScroll = () => { if ( document.body.scrollTop > 80 || document.documentElement.scrollTop > 80 ) { headerRef.current.classList.add('sticky_header'); } else { headerRef.current.classList.remove('sticky_header'); } }; useEffect(() => { window.addEventListener('scroll', handleScroll); return () => { window.removeEventListener('scroll', handleScroll); }; }, []); const handleClick = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); const targetAttr = e.target.getAttribute('href'); const targetElement = document.querySelector(targetAttr); if (targetElement) { const location = targetElement.offsetTop; window.scrollTo({ top: location - 80, left: 0, behavior: 'smooth' }); } }; const toggleMenu = () => setMenuOpen(!isMenuOpen); const toggleSkills = () => setSkillsOpen(!isSkillsOpen); return (
{/* Logo */}
AB

Akshay

Balte

{/* Menu */}
  • Home
  • About

{/* Menu End */}
{/* Skills Dropdown */} {isSkillsOpen && (

Skills

Frontend:

  • ⚛️ Languages: JavaScript, HTML, CSS
  • 🛠️ Frameworks & Libraries: React, Bootstrap, React-Redux
  • 🌐 Web Technologies: AJAX, JSON, jQuery, HTTP Protocols
  • 🗂️ Data Structures: Arrays, Linked Lists, Stacks, Queues, Trees, Graphs

Backend:

  • 🖥️ Languages: Java, C#, C, C++
  • 🚀 Frameworks: Spring Core, Spring MVC, Spring JPA, Spring REST, Spring Boot, Spring AOP, Spring Test, Hibernate, JDBC, JSP, Servlets, J2EE
  • 🔗 Web Technologies: RESTful API
  • 🔒 Security: Spring Security
  • 📅 Methodologies: Agile, Scrum

MERN Stack:

  • 🌲 MongoDB
  • 🟩 Express.js
  • ⚛️ React
  • 🧑‍💻 Node.js

Testing:

  • 🤖 Selenium
  • 📝 Manual Testing

Tools & Platforms:

  • 🧑‍💻 Development Tools: STS, VS Code
  • 🗂️ Version Control: Git, GitHub
  • 🖥️ Operating Systems: Linux, Unix, Windows, Unix Shell Scripting

Database:

  • 🗃️ Databases: MySQL, NoSQL
  • 🧑‍💻 Technologies: SQL, PL/SQL

Cloud Computing & DevOps:

  • ☁️ AWS, Jenkins (CI/CD Pipelines)

Project Management Tools:

  • 🛠️ Tools: Jira, Git

Microsoft .NET Technologies:

  • 🔧 Frameworks: ASP.NET MVC Core, .NET Core, Entity Framework
  • ⚙️ Languages: C#
  • • Frameworks: ASP.NET MVC Core, .NET Core, ADO.NET, Entity Framework (Code First & Database First)
  • • Languages: C#, .NET Framework
  • • Web Development: ASP.NET MVC, Razor Pages, Web API (RESTful Services)
  • • Database Access: Entity Framework, LINQ to SQL, ADO.NET
  • • Multithreading & Asynchronous Programming: Task Parallel Library, async/await, Threading
)}
); }; export default Header;
